data.title: Mahnaz Afshar
data.meta_description: Born Mahnaz Afshar June 11, 1977 (1977 06 11) (age 34) Tehran, Iran Occupati
data.text:
Mahnaz Afshar was born in Tehran on 21st of Khordad year 1356 (June 11, 1977).

She got her high school degree in natural science course. After graduation of high school one of her relatives who was the theater affairs assistant ion Soureh college introduced her to Hannaneh Art institute.

She studied video edition and learned this course theoretically and practically both.

She did the assembling job of Ketabe Avval training materials which was done by Darioush Mehrjooii.

She was invited by Miss. Shamsi Fazl Elahi to play in a TV serial called Gomshodeh (LOST) which was directing by Mr.Masud Navaii and it was her first play.

Later she was invited by Mr. Abdollah Eskandari to play in movie called Doostan (Friends) and this movie was arrested because of some problems.

The first movie of Mahnaz Afshar as an actress which was shown in the cinema was called SHoure Eshgh (Passion of Love) and it found very good acceptance by the people those days.

Changing methods and using higher accuracy in choosing rolls after playing in Atashbas (Stop fighting) and Salade Fasl (Salad of the season) and ……helped her to find her way and be more active in her job.

Filmography

Year Title Director Role 1999 Shirha-ye-javan (The young lions) 1999 Doostan (friends) 2000 Shoor-e eshgh (The passion of love) Nader Moghaddas 2000 Khakestary (gray) Bita 2001 Negin(gem) Neda 2002 Zahr-e asal (The poison of honey) 2002 Dokhtary dar ghafas (The girl within the cage) 2003 koma (coma) 2003 Sizdah gorbeh rooy-e shirvani (Thirteen cats on the roof) 2004 Salad-e fasl (Salad) 2005 Kargaran mashghool e karand (Men at work) Mani Haghighi Sahar 2005 Che kasi amir ra kosht? (Who murdered Amir?) Mehdi Karampour Marjan 2005 Taleh (Trap) 2005 Akvarium (aquarium) 2005 Atash bas (Cease fire) Tahmineh Milani Sayeh 2006 Mohakemeh (The Trial) 2006 ra-ees (The boss) Masoud Kimiai Tala 2007 Kalagh par 2007 Tasvi-eh hesab (Pay back) Tahmineh Milani sara 2007 Enekas (Reflection) 2008 Shabaneh rooz 2008 Da-vat (Invitation) Ebrahim Hatamikia sheyda 2008 Shirin Abbas Kiarostami Woman in audience 2008 Poopak & mash mashal-lah Poopak 2009 Emshab shab-e mahtab-e Sahar 2009 khatereh (memory) 2009 pesar-e adam, dokhtar-e hav-va (Eve's daughter, Adam's son) Rambod Javan Mina 2009 tabagheh sev-vom (The third floor) 2010 pazel (Puzzle) 2010 Sandevich-e sard (cold sandwich) 2010 Aroos-e tehran (Teheran's bride) 2010 sa-adat abad Maziar Miri 2011 barf rooy-e kaj ha (snow on pine trees) Peyman Moaadi

tasvie hesab(pony) by Tahmineh Milani (2010)
